# Helvety Contacts

> Private and secure contact management with end-to-end encryption. Manage your contacts with ease. Engineered and designed in Switzerland.

## Core Pages
- [Home](https://contacts.helvety.com): End-to-end encrypted contact management app

## Helvety Ecosystem
- [Helvety](https://helvety.com): Main Helvety website with company information and legal pages
- [Helvety Store](https://store.helvety.com): Official store for Helvety software products and subscriptions
- [Helvety PDF](https://pdf.helvety.com): Free, privacy-focused PDF toolkit
- [Helvety Auth](https://auth.helvety.com): Centralized authentication for all Helvety apps
- [Helvety Tasks](https://tasks.helvety.com): End-to-end encrypted task management

## Optional
- [GitHub](https://github.com/CasparRubin/helvety-contacts): Public repository for Helvety Contacts (source-visible, not open source)
